text.div:
Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition

Resource PlanDefinition "IMMZ.DT.06.Pneumococcal"

url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/PlanDefinition/IMMZ.DT.06.Pneumococcal

version: 0.1.0

name: IMMZ.DT.06.Pneumococcal

title: IMMZ.DT.06.Pneumococcal

status: draft

date: 2023-03-31 14:01:17+0000

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Pneumococcal vaccine minimum age 6 weeks old

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT06

action

title: Immunize Patient for Pneumococcal - No Doses

description: Provide Pneumococcal immunizations – using the "PCV immunization 2p+1 schedule – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Pneumococcal vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because no doses in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Weeks" >= 6text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because no doses in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Country is following a 2 dose scheme" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because no doses in a 2 dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.06.Pneumococcal.01

action

title: Immunize Patient for Pneumococcal - 1 Dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

*"Pneumococcal vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last Pneumococcal dose given" >= "8 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

condition

kind: applicability

definition: IMMZ.DT.06.Pneumococcal.02

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

*"Pneumococcal vaccine immunization history" = "2 dose"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal booster because 2 doses in a 2+1 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" >= 9text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal booster because 2 doses in a 2+1 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Country is using a 2 dose scheme" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal booster because 2 doses in a 2+1 dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.06.Pneumococcal.03

definition: IMMZ.DT.06.Pneumococcal.11

action

title: Immunize Patient for Pneumococcal - HIV positive and preterm who received their 3 doses before 12 months of age

description: Provide Pneumococcal immunizations – using the "PCV immunization – Booster for HIV+ and preterm" schedule (1 booster dose in second year of life)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Pneumococcal vaccine immunization history" = "3 doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal Booster in second year of life because HIV infected or preterm who completed 3-dose series before 12 months of age

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"HIV Status" = "Positive"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal Booster in second year of life because HIV infected or preterm who completed 3-dose series before 12 months of age

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Age when Patient received 3rd dose in Months" < 12text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal Booster in second year of life because HIV infected or preterm who completed 3-dose series before 12 months of age

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" >= 12text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal Booster in second year of life because HIV infected or preterm who completed 3-dose series before 12 months of age

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" <= 24text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal Booster in second year of life because HIV infected or preterm who completed 3-dose series before 12 months of age
